aboutText: The PMI Chapter Awards program provides recognition of volunteer efforts, motivates chapter leaders, and acknowledges their contributions toward achieving PMI's goals.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Puerto Rico Chapter | Latin America Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: Celebrating a fantastic closing of 2022 Annual Symposium.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI New Brunswick Chapter | North America Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMI New Brunswick Chapter's first in-person networking event in Saint John since the COVID-19 restrictions ended. The event was held on the University of New Brunswick Saint John campus. PMI New Brunswick has a strong partnership with the universityâ€™s MBA program. Students from neighboring colleges were invited as well.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI South Korea Chapter | Asia Pacific Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMI South Korea Chapter's 100th Special Seminar.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Chennai Chapter | South Asia Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMSAC23 Volunteers - PMI Chennai Chapter.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Kenya Chapter | Sub-Saharan Africa Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: PMI Kenya Chapter at PMI Africa Conference 2023.

images.captionTitle: Finalist: PMI Southern Italy Chapter | Europe Region
images.imageCaption: Pictured above: A meeting within the PMI Southern Italy Volunteer Masterclass, 2022 edition.
